# Data Stewardship Unit

Welcome to the Data Stewardship Website for Fisheries and Oceans Canada employees in the Pacific Region Science Branch. This website provides support for your data stewardship and management responsibilities.



## Perspectives

Browse our resources by your perspective.

## About this site

This site was created with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) by Brett Johnson and Albury C. and is hosted with [Github Pages](https://pages.github.com/). The user perspectives were inspired by the [ELIXIR RDMKit site](https://rdmkit.elixir-europe.org/). Icons from [Font Awesome](https://fontawesome.com/). For issues with the site, please create a Github issue or contact [Albury C.](mailto:catalina.albury@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
